snippet.title: Trailer - Railways
snippet.description:
From the makers of Traffix, Railways is a simulation game where you have trains, passengers and railways. 

Your goal is to move the trains strategically between the tracks, picking up the passengers and preventing crashes. Your mission is complete when you collect all the passengers.
